reviewText: Purchased this 16 years ago when my daughter was 3. She couldn't get enough of Loonette and Molly and the Big, Comfy couch. We still sing the song every now and then. Great show, great characters, great memories!
Perfect! Came on time, exactly what I was looking for!

I watched the Big Comfy Couch growing up, and wanted to purchase one of the Big Comfy Couch movies for my kids to enjoy like i did. My kids love this movie. Whenever its on, their eyes are glued to the T.V..I will definitely be purchasing more Big Comfy Couch movies!
My granddaughter loves watching TV on a cold and rainy day. And this looked like a good one to add to her collection. She loves it. It was a good buy.

The Big Comfy Couch always has such a wonderful way of making something potentially negative and turning it so it's more positive.  That's the way this movie is.  We love BCC and as always it's wonderful at getting to the point in a childs perspective.
